name: chipTuned
description:
///a POKEY punk console

   

Tune the Tones . Break the Beats. Pluck at the heartstrings of sound in this Arcade Instrument.

///arcade action

Break all of the Beats in the Chamber. Go for the highest (or lowest) BPM.

CHIP & TUNE!!!

///instrument potential

We have brought to life the classic sounds of the POKEY sound chip. This chip was at the heart of the Atari age of video game music. It featured the synthesis of square waves and pseudo random noise that programmers could utilize to create both sound effects and scores. Now you have the power to play with these sounds using an instrument you already know, the gamepad, in a language you already speak, games.

 Go here to check out some amazing POKEY music. And here to get a more in depth look at this chips sonic capabilities.

///YOU MUST USE A GAMEPAD///
